title: Kobe Bryant Reportedly Visited A Hospitalized Lamar Odom, Who Remains In ‘Critical Condition’
text:
Kobe Bryant Reportedly Visited A Hospitalized Lamar Odom, Who Remains In ‘Critical Condition’ 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
On Tuesday night against the Kings, Kobe Bryant suffered a left knee contusion that had many wondering if the 37-year-old was done. But with...
